de.dfki.embots.behaviorbuilder.utility
Class ArmMirroring

java.lang.Object
  de.dfki.embots.behaviorbuilder.utility.ArmMirroring
All Implemented Interfaces:
BBConstants
public class ArmMirroring
extends java.lang.Object
implements BBConstants

Class comprising "mirror" operations for positions in the EMBRGui.

Constructor Detail

ArmMirroring

public ArmMirroring()
Method Detail

getMode

public ArmMirroring.MirrorMode getMode()
Get the currently set mirroring mode.

Returns:
the current mode

setModeToNone

public void setModeToNone()
Set that there be no mirroring whatsoever. ArmMirroring operations requested while this mode is active will return *null*.

setModeToMirror

public void setModeToMirror(double mirrorX)
Set actual mirroring to be the mirroring mode, using a given yz-plane as the mirror.

Parameters:
mirrorX - the mirror plane, by its x-coordinate

setModeToMirror

public void setModeToMirror()
Set actual mirroring to be the mirroring mode, using a preset default yz-plane as the mirror.

setModeToMirror

public void setModeToMirror(Triple lh,
                            Triple rh)
Set actual mirroring to be the mirroring mode, preserving the mirror plane, whose x-coordinate is computed as the mean of the given 3d-points' x-values.

Parameters:
lh - the left-hand point to determine the mirror
rh - the right-hand point to determine the mirror

setModeToAlternate

public void setModeToAlternate(double mirrorHeight)
Set /alternate/ mirroring mode, using a given mirror height.

Parameters:
mirrorHeight - the height of the mirror, as z-coordinate

setModeToAlternate

public void setModeToAlternate()
Set /alternate/ mirroring mode, using a default mirror height.

setModeToAlternate

public void setModeToAlternate(Triple lh,
                               Triple rh)
Set /alternate/ mirroring mode, preserving the mirror height. The mirror xy-axis' height (the z-level) is overtaken from the current given z-values, i.e. the arithmetic mean of the left-hand-z and the right-hand-z

Parameters:
lh - The left-hand point (for EMBRPoser, this is the left hand's position)
rh - The right-hand point

setModeToParallel

public void setModeToParallel(double fixedDistance)
Set /parallel/ mirroring mode, using the given fixed hand distance.

Parameters:
fixedDistance - the distance between the two side points

setModeToParallel

public void setModeToParallel()
Set /parallel/ mirroring mode, using the default distance. Not longer used by the EMBRPoser

setModeToParallel

public void setModeToParallel(Triple lh,
                              Triple rh)
Set /parallel/ mirroring mode, using the distance between two given points.

Parameters:
lh - left-hand point
rh - right-hand point

getPossibleModes

public static ArmMirroring.MirrorMode[] getPossibleModes()
Get an array of all possible mirroring modes, as defined in this class.

Returns:
all modes defined here.
